mapper.select: SELECT product_id from relation_activities_common_and_product WHERE activities_common_id=#{id} ORDER BY `order` DESC, id DESC
SELECT product_id from relation_activities_common_and_product WHERE activities_common_id=#{id} and is_display=1 ORDER BY `order` DESC, id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime} WHERE type = 1 AND id IN ( SELECT rac.product_id FROM activities_common ac, relation_activities_common_and_product rac WHERE ac.id = rac.activities_common_id AND ac.type = 1 AND ac.id=#{groupId} )
mapper.select: select * from activities_common where id=#{id} and is_available=1

select p.id as id, p.name as name, p.sales_price as salesPrice,p.bs_commision as commision from product p, relation_activities_common_and_product racp where racp.activities_common_id =#{activityCommonId} and p.id=racp.product_id and racp.is_display=1 LIMIT #{start},#{max}
select count(p.id) from product p, relation_activities_common_and_product racp where racp.activities_common_id=#{activityCommonId} and p.id=racp.product_id and racp.is_display=1
